Text: Thanks a lot !!! This serie is awesome !

no worries. whenever there is an issue, let me know. i appreciate it, 'cause i don't always read the new scans before posting them here.

"Injustice: Gods Among Us Dominates ComiXology Sales Worldwide"
http://www.bleedingcool.com/2013/04/18/comixology-all-over-the-world-3/

which software do I have to use to view this ? 
a noob in need of help :p
there are a few different popular readers. i use CDisplayEX, which is free at  http://www.cdisplayex.com/
There's also Simple Comic (Mac) and Comic Rack (Windows).  These are the two I use.  I might try CDisplayEX again if their UI has improved any since I last tried it.
i totally agree, the UI is clunky. however, i think it is a little more stable and less prone to loading errors.
BIG UP to STFmaryville!!! Thanks for uploading this great series. Is there a chance to get issue #12, or didn't i just find it?
